column4: yeah i install compizconfig -settings-manger and changed all settings could'nt work   http://maketecheasier.com/make-your-ubuntu-desktop-rotate-as-a-cylindersphere/2008/07/28
did you enable both 'desktop cube' and 'rotate cube'?
and check what the keyboard bindings are set to?
yeah i enabled both
compiz is running?  menu's and such fade in and out rather than appearing, right?
i could not see any changes in my setting,
i am new to linux im learning now
go to applications | accessories | terminal, and run pidof compiz.real, tell me what it sayrs
exactly this:  pidof compiz.real
no changes
what did it say?
we haven't done anything yet, I'm just trying to get information :p
ok
if it said a number, tell me the number, if it just left you at a sravan@sravan-desktop: prompt, then tell me that too :)
it just left with sravan@sravan-laptop:
okay, compiz isn't running
run:  glxinfo | grep direct
direct rendring : yes
what happens when you go to system | preferences | appearance | visual effects <tab> | and hit normal (or anything other than none, actually)
any luck?
background becomes blur
does it work though?
make sure you don't have the blur plugin enabled (for real)
what kind of video card do you have?
